name: glucope
description: For both clinician and patient password:         The length of password between 8 and 16.         The characters for password include: regular expression-->  /^[A-Za-z0-9_@./#&+-]*$/   All account data register input would have reasonable data input validation functions to prevent undesirable data entry. For clinician:         Clinicians can update their accounts password.         Clinicians can update the workplace.         Clinicians can set up an account for patient (the password is without bcrypt for patient to know their password)
